War Office .Handed In 2.15 a.m, 5.12.17* Received 10.50 a.m. 6.2.2 ..27.10C16 December 4th. Situation. Evening.3rd Army.. Italians attempted to drive the enemy from Zenson salient to-day. About 20 prisoners and some machine guns were captured but attack did not succeed. Nothing of importance on rest of front.4th Army. Enemy's artillery active against Italian position on Monte Solarolo and Mount Pallone otherwise situation normal.1st Army. Bombardment 20th and 22nd Corps fronts continued heavy during night and this morning. At 10.15 a*m. the enemy began repeated attacks in force against this front / from Mount Badenecche to Mount Zomo two miles east of GalliOc The enemy was repulsed ?apparently with heavy loss except between Ba enecche and Tondarecar, where he succeeded in penetrating on to the saddle between these two heights. Italians are preparing to counter-attack here to-morrow ?morning. On the rest of front situation normal.3rd Army Corps, Nothing of importance.
